Question.Subject: Broadband contracts . Need advice on the best deals in U.K. ?
Question.Content: What if the difference between unlimited downloads and unlimited usage ? Can you recomend any good providers ? I have always just used B.T. but lately they have got expensive it is costing Â£172 a quatre for my phone line , bradband and calls. I do not make many calls. Thanks.
Question.ChosenAnswer: I just changed to plusnet - give them a phone and they'll go through it all with you, what package would suit etc. BT are thieving crooks.

Answer.Content: I just changed to plusnet - give them a phone and they'll go through it all with you, what package would suit etc. BT are thieving crooks.
